Conclusion .The success of dictionary - based cross - language IR largely depends on the coverage of underlying lexicons .We optimize the lexical coverage by limiting the lexicon to semantically relevant subwords .Based on this architecture we presented an interlingua approach to cross - language information retrieval on a medical document collection .

Conclusion .The success of dictionary - based cross - language IR largely depends on the coverage of underlying lexicons .We optimize the lexical coverage by limiting the lexicon to semantically relevant subwords .Based on this architecture we presented an interlingua approach to cross - language information retrieval on a medical document collection .
